name: Edge of Abyss
description:
Greetings to my Godot Wild Jam submission for the month of October.

Unfortunately, I was unable to deliver the expierience I envisioned a week ago when joining the Jam. Level design is the department I feel is most lacking, and I will shortly add levels which were designed but not fully implemented at the time of submission.

I would like to thank https://burntrobot.itch.io/ for creating the art assets for this game on an extremely short notice.
